price: Hakika ni kwetu Sisi ndio marejeo yao.
footnotes: Hakika ni kwetu Sisi marejeo yao kwa kifo na kufufuliwa, wala hapana penginepo isipo kuwa kwetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
